metadata.title: CVE-2024-2279 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 16.7 to 16.8.6 all versions starting from 16.9 before 16.9.4,all versions starting from 16.10 before 16.10.2. Using the autocomplete forissues references feature a crafted payload may lead to a stored XSS,allowing attackers to perform arbitrary actions on behalf of victims.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
